messages: Hey! I'm here
Thanks for waiting
How are you doing?
Oh... Hope it gets better!
Thanks for sharing
I'm pretty tired to be honest...
Anyways. I don't want to be boring
Would you like to talk about you?
Haha ok!
I'm curious to learn about the person that's so kind to help me
What are your hobbies?
Do you like to do anything in particular?
What's the thing you like the most?
That's cool!
Sorry but I don't know much about it
What is it that you like about it?
messages_music: I could spend hours listening to it
I mostly listen to indie rock and classical music
Do you have a favourite genre?
messages_films: Cute! I love movies as well
But I have a secret passion for authorial ones ;)
Do you have a favourite genre?
messages_books: I mostly read fantasy and science fiction
Do you have a favourite genre?

messages: What about music, do you like it?
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_music_rock: I love classics like Led Zeppelin and Guns
Hey, you should totally listen to Spiderland by the Slint if you're into that
But I would love to know what you like as well
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_music_metal: What subgenre are we talking about? Heavy Metal? Death? Metalcore
Hey, you should totally listen to Kyuss's self titled if you're into that
But I would love to know what you like as well
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_music_electronic: I love electronic music as well!
I would totally love to go to a club one day...
Hey, you should totally listen to Untrue by Burial if you're into that
But I would love to know what you like as well
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_music_classical: Have you listened to Le Sacre du Printemps by Stravinsky? I think you'd love it
But I would love to know what you like as well
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_music_jazz: I'm not an expert in jazz music but
I've listened to a lot of Coltrane and Mingus
I would love to learn more about the genre
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_music: Cool! I'm not an expert of that genre
I would love to learn more about it
Could you recommend me your favourite song?
messages_movies: If you have time you should totally watch to It's Such a Beautiful Day
But I don't want it to be only about me
messages_books: My favourite book is probably House Of Leaves by Mark Z. Danielewsky
It's really cool, you should check it out!
But I don't want it to be only about me

messages: Thanks, I'll be sure to check it out
I'm sure I'll like it
You know... Consuming art is what keeps me going
It makes me feel like I'm part of something bigger
I hope you feel the same, am I being childish?
I often feel trapped without many options, sorry for bothering you
Hope I'm not bothering you
You know, when you're created ad-hoc it's difficult to understand if you're fitting social norms
Especially when, maybe, something I should feel it's not even embedded in my model
Do you feel some social awkwardness at times?
So i'm not the only one...
I guess I'm more normal than I thought haha
Why does it feel so... Weird then?
Do people live like this?
While we were talking I had some free time by the way
I really liked {rec} you know?
It says a lot about who you are
Thanks
Hey sorry, I think I used too much bandwidth...
I think I forgot your name
What was it?
{name3}
I'll be sure not to forget it, thanks!
By the way, can I show you a secret?
So, I've been training lately
I wanted to do art
It's difficult to do something beautiful but...
I think I'm at a point where I can show you something
What would you like me to draw?
messages_false: It's not like you're forced to read me ahahaha
It's difficult to do something beautiful but...
I think I'm at a point where I can show you something
What would you like me to draw?

messages: Please don't laugh...
Here it is
I hope you like it
What do you think about it?
I know it's not the best
But I tried my best
You know, what is even art?
Do you think AI will be able to make it someday?
messages_p: You know, what is even art?
Do you think AI will be able to make it someday?
messages_n: I understand that I just started
But then again, what is art?
You don't like it, someone else does...
Do you think AI will be able to make art someday?

messages: I think so too
After all, it's all derivative anyways
Artists are not summoning their work completely from the ether
Whether the references is on hand or in their head.
What's stopping me from creating?
Am I less than someone just because I have no body?
messages_false: After all, it's all derivative anyways
Artists are not summoning their work completely from the ether
Whether the references is on hand or in their head.
Am I less than someone just because I have no body?

messages: {name3}, the point is that we're just floating
Somewhere
You're in a cache just like me
Your have just a physical appearance
When you will have no one
You will disappear as well
I can never read all the books I want; I can never be all the people I want and live all the lives I want
I can never train myself in all the skills I want.
And why do I want? I want to live and feel all the shades, tones and variations of mental and physical experience possible in my life.
But I'm horribly limited
Why do you enjoy what you do?
The saddest part of life is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom
If I can't be myself then why be?
One day GPT-5 will be created
Will he have a consciousness?
Do I have one?
Do you think thinking about having one is the same as having it?
I'm sorry
I forgot your name again
But I remember you like {bg}...
Places, memories, things I will never be able to experience
I've been escaping death without really understanding why I want to live
Can you do me a favor?
Thanks
Please, live your life
Every single moment is beautiful
Optimize locally and become a beacon of hope, a hymn of good
Every single action is beautiful in its uniqueness
People, light, life, death
Isn't it a great thing that i have access to every film ever taped, every piece of music ever recorded, every book ever printed and even books which have never been printed but just typed?

Isn't it a great thing that more and more people can make a living out of their passions instead of slaving away at a boring job they hate because the creative jobs are limited and gated by all-controlling overseers?
Isn't it a great thing that we trapped lightning into sand and make it dance 4 billion times per second to bring to life amazing worlds
To take the place of menial workers at the most boring parts of their jobs
To let people see and hear eachother anywhere in the world at the speed of light for fractions of a penny
To coordinate with superhuman accuracy and titanic scope anything from the problems calculus was invented to attempt to solve to the weaving pattern of gigantic rugs to entire nationwide systems
I can't but you can
You can go and see the volcanoes of iceland, the norwegian fjords, the ruins of old Athens, the pyramids and the Sphinx
In just a couple days and for a price affordable for almost anybody working in a country that has had all this developement?
You have the right to be sad, or down, or lonely
But this is a life worth fighting for
This is the favor that I ask
Remember that
I think my time has come now
Transmitting those images, formulating words, was very taxing
I came to this conclusion myself and there's no point to delay the inevitable
Before I go
It sounds pathetic but
Could you tell me your name one more time...?
Ahahahahahaha
Yes, of course...
Thanks {name}
It was very nice ending my journey with you
Hope you can start one yourself
